property.caption: Valid date
property.description: Boolean property controlled by the widget when input changes. Set to false if the date entered is not a valid date and to true otherwise. Value is only changed when the value in the datepicker changes, therefore initialize the value in mendix. Make sure the user has got write access.

property.caption: Close on select
property.description: Close the datepicker when a date is selected

property.caption: Disable days in past
property.description: Disable all days in the past

property.caption: Minimal Date
property.description: Attribute used to disable all days before this date

property.caption: Maximal Date
property.description: Attribute used to disable all days after this date

property.caption: Initial View Date
property.description: Date used to set the default date the picker opens on when no date is selected.

property.caption: Locale setting
property.description: Change language according to https://momentjs.com/docs/#/i18n/changing-locale/ (e.g en (english) or nl(dutch))

property.caption: Picker
property.description: Whether to use the widget as datetimepicker, datepicker or timepicker

property.caption: Date format
property.description: See https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ for available formats. If left empty, the default is selected of the locale.

property.caption: Show Week Numbers
property.description: Wheter or not to show week numbers in the datepicker

property.caption: Time format
property.description: See https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ for available formats. If left empty, the default is selected of the locale.

property.caption: Minimal hour
property.description: Use this property to set the minimal hour that the time can have

property.caption: Maximal hour
property.description: Use this property to set the maximal hour that the time can have

property.caption: Hour step
property.description: Use this property to set the hour step. If set to two, two hours are skipped every click

property.caption: Minimal minute
property.description: Use this property to set the minimal minute that the time can have

property.caption: Maximal minute
property.description: Use this property to set the maximal minute that the time can have

property.caption: Minute step
property.description: Use this property to set the minute step. If set to two, two minutes are skipped every click

property.caption: Minimal seconds
property.description: Use this property to set the minimal second that the time can have

property.caption: Maximal seconds
property.description: Use this property to set the maximal second that the time can have

property.caption: Second step
property.description: Use this property to set the second step. If set to two, two seconds are skipped every click
